pr_title: [EventGrid] Add system classes for Azure Communication Services

timeline.message: Add system classes for Azure Communication Services
Add system classes mappings for Azure Communication Services

timeline.bodyText: It's odd that some classes use Pascal case and some use all uppercase letters for ACS. Can we use Pascal case throughout?
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: The word boundary was not correctly interpreted by AutoRest. This should have been AcsSmsReceivedEventData. You can use directives in autorest to rename these models.
timeline.author: srnagar

timeline.message: Add mappings for KeyVault, Web and MachineLearning
Use Acs instead of ACS and AcsSms instead of ACSSMS for class names
